item.title: L3Harris季度营收因政府停摆压力未达预期
item.description: 周四公布的财报显示，国防承包商L3Harris Technologies第四季度营收未达华尔街预期，原因是美国政府持续停摆导致合同授予延迟。【原文：Defense contractor L3Harris Technologies missed Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, as a prolonged U.S. government shutdown delayed contract awards.】

item.title: 万事达卡利润因交易量持续增长而上升
item.description: 万事达卡周四公布的财报显示，第四季度利润实现增长，持续的消费者支出推动其交易量上升。【原文：Mastercard posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as sustained consumer spending drove ​up its transaction volumes.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司季度利润因成本控制而上升
item.description: 诺福克南方铁路公司周四报告称，在货运需求波动和宏观经济持续承压的背景下，得益于成本控制，公司第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：Norfolk Southern reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday on cost controls amid uneven freight demand and persistent macroeconomic strain.】

item.title: 普尔特集团季度利润与营收下滑，因购房需求持续疲软
item.description: 普尔特集团周四公布的第四季度财报显示，受通胀环境影响，购房需求持续低迷，导致公司利润与营收双双下滑。【原文：Pultegroup on Thursday posted a drop in profit and revenue for the fourth quarter, as homebuyer demand struggles to ​pick up amid an inflationary environment.】

item.title: 美国合众金融公司利润攀升，客户资产创纪录达1.7万亿美元
item.description: 资产与财富管理公司美国合众金融周四公布，其第四季度利润增长10%，因人工智能驱动的市场反弹推动其收费资产价值创下历史新高。【原文：Asset and wealth manager Ameriprise Financial reported a 10% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as an ​artificial intelligence-fueled market rally boosted the value of ‌its fee-generating assets to a record high.】

item.title: 洛克希德·马丁公司上调2026年业绩预期，因喷气机和武器系统销售增长
item.description: 洛克希德·马丁公司周四预测，2026年的利润和营收将超出华尔街预期，并指出其战斗机和武器系统需求持续旺盛。【原文：Lockheed Martin on Thursday forecast 2026 profit and revenue above Wall Street expectations, citing continued demand for its fighter jets and weapons systems.】

item.title: 包装企业国际纸业将拆分为两家独立公司，以强化对北美市场的聚焦
item.description: 国际纸业周四宣布，将通过剥离欧洲包装业务分拆为两家上市公司，旨在精简运营并提升北美地区的生产效率。【原文：International Paper said on Thursday it would split into two publicly traded ​companies by spinning off its European packaging business, aiming to ‌streamline its operations and boost productivity across North America.】

item.title: 罗杰斯通讯公司季度营收超预期，体育业务表现强劲
item.description: 罗杰斯通讯公司周四公布的第四季度营收超出分析师预期，其媒体和体育业务的强劲增长是主要推动力。【原文：Rogers Communications reported fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Thursday, led by strong growth in its media and sports business.】

item.title: 纳斯达克季度利润因交易量上升而增长
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所周四表示，受市场持续波动推动股票和期权交易量上升的影响，其第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：Nasdaq's profit rose in the fourth quarter, the exchange operator said on Thursday, as prolonged market volatility lifted equity and options trading.】

item.title: 康卡斯特宽带用户持续流失，无线竞争加剧
item.description: 康卡斯特第四季度流失的宽带用户超出预期，竞争对手通过激进优惠吸引消费者，给该公司支柱业务带来巨大压力。【原文：Comcast lost more broadband customers than expected in the fourth quarter, as rivals lured away consumers with aggressive offers, piling pressure on the company's mainstay business.】

item.title: 铜价预测首次突破11,000美元，但分析师担忧需求疲软：路透调查
item.description: 路透社调查显示，在铜价飙升至历史新高后，分析师们首次将2026年铜价共识预测上调至11,000美元以上，但他们对投机过度保持警惕，并预计平均价格将远低于峰值水平。【原文：Analysts have boosted their consensus 2026 price forecast for copper above $11,000 for the first time after the market surged to all-time highs, but are wary about speculative excess and expect prices to average well below the peaks, a Reuters poll shows. .】

item.title: 黑石集团因强劲交易活动超出预期
item.description: 全球最大另类资产管理公司黑石集团周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，得益于交易活动升温带来的收益以及数据中心业务的增长。【原文：Blackstone , the world's largest alternative asset manager, beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as it cashed in on heightened dealmaking activity and saw growth in its data center business.】

item.title: 早盘行情：巨型股涨跌互现，德黑兰局势紧张
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 卡特彼勒预计2026年将面临26亿美元关税冲击，电力设备需求提振季度业绩
item.description: 卡特彼勒警告称，关税将在2026年造成26亿美元的损失，尽管该公司报告称，由于数据中心快速建设推动其发电设备需求持续增长，第四季度营收和利润均实现增长。【原文：Caterpillar warned of a $2.6 billion hit from tariffs in 2026, even ​as it reported a rise in fourth-quarter ‌revenue and profit on sustained demand for its power-generation equipment amid a rapid build-out of data centers.】

item.title: 瑞银集团盈利超预期，得益于并购业务回暖及资产管理业务增长
item.description: 拉扎德周四公布的季度财报超出市场预期，其咨询与资产管理业务的强劲增长是主要推动力。与此同时，这家投行任命内部人士特蕾西·法尔担任首席财务官，该任命将于2月1日生效。【原文：Lazard beat fourth-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, fueled by strong ​growth in its advisory and asset management businesses, while the investment ‌bank named insider Tracy Farr as chief financial officer, effective Feb. 1.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗能源公司季度利润超预期，得益于炼油利润率提升
item.description: 美国炼油商瓦莱罗能源公司周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这得益于利润率回升以及加工量增加。【原文：U.S. refiner Valero Energy surpassed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, on the back of a rebound in margins as well as higher throughput volume.】

item.title: 易捷航空正探讨与星链达成Wi-Fi合作协议，但经济条件尚未成熟
item.description: 易捷航空首席执行官肯顿·贾维斯周四表示，该公司已与埃隆·马斯克的星链公司就提供机上Wi-Fi服务进行过磋商，但目前对这家英国廉价航空公司而言，该项目在经济上并不划算。【原文：EasyJet has held talks with Elon Musk's Starlink about offering on-board Wi-Fi, but the economics do not stack up for the British budget airline at the moment, Chief Executive Kenton Jarvis said on Thursday.】

item.title: 化工巨头陶氏化学将裁员4500人，目标提升20亿美元核心利润
item.description: 陶氏化学周四宣布，将在全面重组中裁减约4500个岗位，旨在提升至少20亿美元的盈利能力。这家化工巨头正面临需求持续疲软及全行业结构性压力的双重挑战。【原文：Dow said on Thursday it ​would slash about 4,500 jobs in ‌a sweeping restructuring aimed at boosting profitability by at least $2 billion, as the chemicals maker battles persistent weak demand and industrywide structural ‌pressures.】

item.title: 投资者押注美联储在暂停加息后将进一步降息以支撑市场
item.description: 华尔街预计美联储的货币宽松周期将在杰罗姆·鲍威尔主席任期结束前维持暂停状态，迫使投资者押注年内进一步降息以支撑看涨头寸。【原文：Wall Street is anticipating a pause in the Federal Reserve's monetary easing cycle to last through the remainder of Chair Jerome Powell's term that ends in May, forcing investors to bank on further ​rate cuts later in the year to support bullish positioning.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔第四季度营收增长，得益于航空航天服务需求的持续强劲
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周四报告称，受航空航天部门和售后市场服务持续强劲表现的推动，公司第四季度营收和利润均实现增长。【原文：Honeywell reported a rise in fourth-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, buoyed by continued strength in its aerospace unit and aftermarket services.】

item.title: 研究人员警告：开源人工智能模型易遭犯罪滥用
item.description: 研究人员周四表示，黑客和其他犯罪分子能够轻易劫持运行开源大型语言模型的计算机，这些计算机不受主要人工智能平台的防护措施和限制约束，从而造成安全风险和漏洞。【原文：Hackers and other criminals can easily commandeer computers operating open-source large language models outside the guardrails and constraints of the major artificial-intelligence platforms, creating security risks and vulnerabilities, researchers said on Thursday.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长警告称，特朗普政策可能引发前所未有的新经济冲击
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫·麦克勒姆向路透社表示，鉴于地缘政治风险升温及美国贸易政策，他认为经济可能面临新一轮冲击的风险显著增加。【原文：Bank ​of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem told Reuters he saw unusual potential for a new shock to the economy, given ‌elevated geopolitical risks and U.S. trade policy.】

item.title: 地缘政治因素对大型石油公司盈利构成重大影响，投资者正密切关注委内瑞拉相关细节
item.description: 埃克森美孚和雪佛龙的高管们周五与分析师举行电话会议时，可能面临更多关于他们在委内瑞拉投资机会的问题，而非实际季度收益。【原文：Exxon Mobil and Chevron executives may face more questions about their investment opportunities in Venezuela than their actual quarterly earnings when they hold calls with analysts on Friday.】

item.title: 美国股指期货小幅上扬，市场消化科技巨头财报
item.description: 周四美国股指期货小幅走高，投资者正权衡科技巨头新一轮人工智能相关支出激增的影响，同时美联储如预期般维持利率不变。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on ​Thursday, as investors weighed another surge in AI-related spending from the tech mega-caps and the ‌Federal Reserve held rates steady as expected.】

item.title: 三星、SK海力士警告称，由于人工智能热潮，个人电脑和手机芯片供应将面临紧缩
item.description: 全球两大芯片制造商周四警告称，随着制造商优先满足构建人工智能基础设施所需的高利润芯片需求，计算机和智能手机公司将首当其冲承受其产品所用DRAM芯片日益短缺的冲击。【原文：Two of the world's top chipmakers warned on Thursday that computer and smartphone companies were set to bear the brunt of a worsening shortage of DRAM chips used in their products, as the makers prioritise demand for more lucrative chips required to build AI infrastructure.】

item.title: PicPay首次公开募股打破巴西企业四年上市荒
item.description: 巴西数字银行PicPay周四在纳斯达克上市，此前该公司通过首次公开募股筹集了4.34亿美元。PicPay由亿万富翁巴蒂斯塔家族控股，这是巴西企业时隔四年多首次实现新股上市。【原文：Brazilian digital bank PicPay, controlled by the billionaire Batista family, debuts on Nasdaq on Thursday after raising $434 million in an initial public offering, the first new stock listing by a Brazilian company ​in more than four years.】

item.title: 印度庞大的互联网与社交媒体应用市场
item.description: 印度是社交媒体公司最重要的增长市场之一，这些公司如今正面临限制年轻人使用呼声，因人们担忧"数字成瘾"问题。【原文：India is one of the most critical growth markets for social media companies, which are now facing calls to limit access to young people, amid fears of "digital addiction".】

item.title: 解读：MSCI是什么？它对印尼股市产生了哪些影响？
item.description: MSCI是资产管理行业（规模达139万亿美元）中的巨头，其决策对全球各国影响深远——印尼投资者本周便为此付出了代价。【原文：MSCI is a powerhouse within the $139 trillion asset management industry and its decisions are hugely consequential for countries around the world - as Indonesian investors learned this week to their cost.】

item.title: 美国启动调查：Waymo自动驾驶汽车在校区附近撞伤儿童，造成轻伤
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，已就上周发生在加州圣莫尼卡市一所小学附近的事故展开调查。当时Waymo自动驾驶汽车撞上一名儿童，造成轻伤。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Thursday it is opening an investigation after a Waymo self-driving vehicle struck a child near an elementary school in Santa Monica, California last week, causing minor injuries.】

item.title: SAP股价或创2020年以来最大单日跌幅
item.description: 欧洲最大软件制造商SAP的股价周四创下2020年10月以来最大单日跌幅，下跌逾10%。该公司财报未能阻止股价下跌趋势，自2025年峰值以来，其市值已蒸发约1500亿美元。【原文：Shares in Europe's largest software maker SAP were set for their steepest daily fall since October 2020 on Thursday, down over 10% after results failed to stem a slide that has wiped around $150 billion off its market value from its 2025 peak.】
